description: Gather the ingredients for making tea.
name: Gather Ingredients
pseudocode: Identify tea type. Check for tea bags or loose leaf tea. Locate sugar, milk, and any desired flavorings.

description: Gather the equipment for making tea.
name: Gather Equipment
pseudocode: Find a kettle for boiling water. Locate a mug or teapot. Assemble a spoon or stirrer.
